section.title:
purchase orders printing purchasing form
forms for purchase orders Print P/O Form
section.para: To print a Purchase Order Form, select the "Print P/O Form" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing a Purchase Order Form, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Purchase Order Number of the Purchase Order you want to print.
Specify the Form you want to use for printing the Purchase Order.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without generating a report, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
